title: War Machine
description: War Machine – Book one in the Destiny in the Shadows SeriesBlackmailed, cornered, and screwed. That’s what happens when you get caught…If you’re an assassin, that is. When a contract killer teams up with a four-star general to track down an elusive terrorist group, sparks fly and not of the romantic variety. Racing against the clock through the desert to save their city, they discover that the terrorists aren’t always the ones to fear… and may not be their true enemy.
author: Maggie Lynn Heron-Heidel
